label: 執権
本: Terms and Concepts in Japanese Medieval History . Journal of Japanese Studies . 1983
説明文: A term for important managerial posts like the head of a mandokoro. Post of shogunal regent in the Kamakura bakufu, held by members of the Hōjō house. He exercised power in behalf of the shōgun. (See Mass, Court and Bakufu) [政所、北条、将軍]
